and PROC_DEF_ID_ = #{parameter.processDefinitionId} and EXECUTION_ID_ is null and PROC_INST_ID_ is null
and TENANT_ID_ = #{parameter.tenantId}
and (TENANT_ID_ = '' or TENANT_ID_ is null)
